page.title: 11ECOLOGY - CONT
page.content: trioxide which are the main components of acid rain. However, despite this precautions are taken to limit the amount of sulphur dioxide released by using a sulphur recovery unit. Ash is also released during combustion. In the cooling process which the companies use, water vapour is produced and precautions are taken to prevent bacterial infection of this water by adding chromate. Water pollution is controlled by the Water Authority who, in conjunction with the Tees River Authority, test the Tees regularly for pollution. All water passing from the various factories to the river are cleaned by the companies' various biological filtering units which some say make the water cleaner than it was when the companies originally extracted ti from the Tees.
